comment: Name: HTTPS content inspection list imported
Sample: msg_id="0F00-0001" When a pre-defined HTTPS exception list is imported, this event log is generated to inform the user.
Description: HTTPS content inspection exception list imported
Format: HTTPS content inspection exception list imported

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / Connection Framework Manager" name="HTTPS content inspection list imported" description="HTTPS content inspection exception list imported"

comment: Sample: msg_id="0F01-0015" When APT server analysis result returned and identified as certain level threat, this event log will be generated to inform that the APT notification has been sent with detailed information.

Format: APT threat notified. Details='Policy Name: HTTPS-proxy-00 Reason: high APT threat detected Task_UUID: d09445005c3f4a9a9bb78c8cb34edc2a Source IP: 10.0.1.2 Source Port: 43130 Destination IP: 67.228.175.200 Destination Port: 443 Proxy Type: HTTP Proxy Host: analysis.lastline.com Path: /docs/lastline-demo-sample.exe'

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / Connection Framework Manager" name="APT threat notified" description="APT threat notified. Details='%s'"

comment: Name: APT safe result from file submission. Details='%s'
Sample: msg_id="0F01-0016" APT safe result from file submission. Details='%s'

Format: APT safe result from file submission. Details='Policy Name: HTTP-OUT-00 Reason: clean Message: APT safe object Task_UUID: 7a1e1500e92a410fa44d907f96b9209e MD5: d2723ba60dc88ec1ea449be9eee601cc Source IP: 10.0.1.2 Source Port: 50293 Destination IP: 100.100.100.3 Destination Port: 80 Proxy Type: HTTP Proxy Host: 100.100.100.3 Path: /test.exe'

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / Connection Framework Manager" name="APT safe result from file submission. Details='%s'" description=""

comment: Sample: msg_id="1C02-00CD" FTP proxy -- Failed to check the specified ruleset
Description: Cannot get the rule from ruleset '%s'
Format: Cannot get the rule from ruleset 'request/download'

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Ruleset lookup failed" description="Cannot get the rule from ruleset '%s'"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1B04-00CE" SMTP proxy -- Failed to check the specified ruleset

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / SMTP" name="Ruleset lookup failed" description="Ruleset '%s' lookup failed"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0000" The traffic was blocked because the message included an invalid number of questions.
Description: DNS invalid number of questions
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56701 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS invalid number of questions" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Invalid number of questions" description="DNS invalid number of questions"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0001" The DNS query was blocked because the DNS query name exceeded the allowed buffer size, which varies from 0 kilobytes to 64 kilobytes.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56702 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS oversized query name" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Query name oversized" description="DNS oversized query name"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0002" The DNS query was blocked because the domain name was compressed.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56703 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS compressed query name" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Query name compressed" description="DNS compressed query name"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0003" The DNS request was blocked because the proxy failed to parse the domain name.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56704 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS parse error" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Parse error" description="DNS Parse error"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0004" The DNS query was not Internet CLASS. The log message specifies the action taken and the CLASS.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 46828 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS Not Internet CLASS" proxy_act="DNS-Outgoing.1" query_class="ANY" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Not Internet CLASS" description="DNS Not Internet CLASS"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0005" The OpCode matched a configured rule, or the default rule of no match. The log message specifies the action taken, the rule, and the OpCode.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.3 192.168.130.81 36755 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS OpCode match" proxy_act="DNS-Outgoing.1" rule_name="Query" query_opcode="QUERY" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="OPcode match" description="DNS OpCode match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0006" The query type matched a configured rule, or the default rule of no match. The log message specifies the action taken, the rule matched, and the query type.
Format: "Deny 2-Optional-1 0-External udp 10.0.2.2 192.168.130.245 53710 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS query type match" proxy_act="DNS-Outgoing.1" rule_name="PTR record" query_type="PTR" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Query type match" description="DNS query type match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0007" The DNS query was blocked because the query size was less than the minimum valid size of 17 bytes.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56704 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS undersized question" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Question undersized" description="DNS undersized question"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0008" The DNS query was blocked because the query size exceeds the maximum allowed size of 271 bytes.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56705 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS oversized question" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Question oversized" description="DNS oversized question"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0009" The DNS connection was idle longer than the configured timeout value in the DNS policy.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Timeout" description="DNS timeout"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-000A" The DNS response was blocked because the response size was less than the minimum value of 17 bytes.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56706 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS undersized answer" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Response answer undersized" description="DNS undersized answer"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-000C" The DNS response was blocked because the response ID did not match the current or previous request ID.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 56706 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS invalid response" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Response ID Invalid" description="DNS invalid response"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-000E" The DNS query name matched a configured rule, or the default rule of no match. The log message specifies the rule matched, action taken, and query name.

Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.3 192.168.130.81 59806 53 msg="ProxyDeny: DNS question match" proxy_act="DNS-Outgoing.1" rule_name="GStatic" query_type="A" question="ssl.gstatic.com" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Query question match" description="DNS question match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-000F" The DNS request audit log specifies the query type and name.

Format: "Allow 2-Optional-1 0-External udp 10.0.2.2 192.168.130.245 61758 53 msg="DNS request" proxy_act="DNS-Outgoing.1" query_type="PTR" question="1.0.0.127.dnsbugtest.1.0.0.127.in-addr.arpa" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Request" description="DNS request"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0010" Intrusion Prevention Service (IPS) detected an intrusion threat. The log message specifies the signature ID, threat severity, signature name, and signature category.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 1024 53 msg="ProxyDrop: DNS IPS match" proxy_act="DNS-Outgoing.1" signature_id="1056125" severity="4" signature_name="EXPLOIT Tftpd32 DNS Server Buffer Overflow" signature_cat="Buffer Over Flow" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="IPS match" description="DNS IPS match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1DFF-0012" Application Control identified the application type from the DNS client query and server response. The log message specifies the application name and ID, the application category name and ID, and the behavior name and ID.

Format: "Allow 1-Trusted 0-External udp 10.0.1.3 192.168.130.81 36755 53 msg="ProxyAllow: DNS App match" proxy_act="DNS-Outgoing.1" app_cat_name="Network Management" app_cat_id="9" app_name="DNS" app_id="61" app_beh_name="access" app_beh_id="6" (DNS-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / DNS" name="Application match" description="DNS App match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0000" The user name exceeds the maximum length specified in the FTP proxy. The default is 64 characters.
Description: FTP user name too long
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 60774 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP user name too long" proxy_act="FTP-Client.1" user="testusertestuser1" length="17" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="User name too long" description="FTP user name too long"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0001" The password specified for the user exceeds the maximum length configured in the FTP proxy. The default maximum length is 32 characters.
Description: FTP user password too long
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 60776 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP user password too long" proxy_act="FTP-Client.1" length="17" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Password too long" description="FTP user password too long"

comment: Name: File or directory name too long
Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0002" The file or directory name exceeds the maximum length configured in the FTP proxy. The default maximum length is 1,024 bytes.
Description: FTP file or directory name too long
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 60782 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP file or directory name too long" proxy_act="FTP-Client.1" length="5" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="File or directory name too long" description="FTP file or directory name too long"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0003" The command exceeded the maximum length configured in the FTP proxy. The default maximum length is 1,030 characters.
Description: FTP command line too long
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 60784 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP command line too long" proxy_act="FTP-Client.1" length="12" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Command line too long" description="FTP command line too long"

comment: Name: Exceeded maximum allowed login attempts
Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0004" The user exceeded the configured maximum number of allowed failed log in attepmts per connection. The default limit is 6.
Description: FTP exceeded maximum permitted login attempts
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 49162 21 msg="ProxyDrop: FTP exceeded maximum permitted login attempts" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Exceeded maximum allowed login attempts" description="FTP exceeded maximum permitted login attempts"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0005" The command matched a configured rule, or the default of no match. For the FTP-server proxy action, the default is to deny any command that does not appear on the list. For the FTP-client proxy action, there is no default restriction on commands. The log message specifies the proxy action, action taken, and the command.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 49196 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP command match" proxy_act="FTP-Client.2" rule_name="LIST" command="ls" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Command match" description="FTP command match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0006" The file type matched a configured download rule, or the default rule of no match. The log message specifies the proxy action, action taken, and file type.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 49208 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP download match" proxy_act="FTP-Client.2" rule_name="*.zip" file_name="hostname.zip" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Download match" description="FTP download match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0007" The file type matched a configured upload rule, or the default rule of no match. The log message specifies the proxy action, action taken, and file type.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 49228 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP upload match" proxy_act="FTP-Client.2" rule_name="ISO" file_name="test.iso" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Upload match" description="FTP upload match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0008" The connection exceeded the configured idle time value. The default is 180 seconds.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Timeout" description="FTP timeout"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0009" The FTP proxy rejected the command because of a lack of required arguments, such as a user name. The log message specifies the proxy action and command.
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 49579 21 msg="ProxyDeny: FTP invalid request" proxy_act="FTP-Client.2" reason="No username value provided for USER command" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Invalid request" description="FTP invalid request"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-000C" This log message for the FTP request transaction includes the source and destination IP addresses for the initial connections.

Format: "Allow 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 49590 21 msg="FTP request" proxy_act="FTP-Client.2" ctl_src="10.0.1.49:47553" ctl_dst="11.11.11.2:5120" file="test.exe" rcvd_bytes="1084" sent_bytes="0" user="testuser" type="download" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Request" description="FTP request"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-000D" Intrusion Prevention Service (IPS) detected a threat. The action configured for an IPS Match will be applied to the traffic. The log message includes the signature ID, threat severity, signature name, and signature category.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 1024 21 msg="ProxyDrop: FTP IPS match" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" signature_id="1110297" severity="4" signature_name="EXPLOIT FlashGet FTP PWD Command Stack buffer overflow -1" signature_cat="Buffer Over Flow" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="IPS match" description="FTP IPS match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-000E" Gateway AntiVirus (GAV) detected a virus or malware in the attachment. The log message specifies the detected virus name and the file name of the attachment.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 56528 msg="ProxyDrop: FTP Virus found" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="11.11.11.2:5120" ctl_dst="10.0.1.49:47553" virus="EICAR_Test" file="eicar.com" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="GAV Virus found" description="FTP Virus found"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-000F" Gateway AntiVirus (GAV) failed to scan due to the error specified in the log message.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 44485 msg="ProxyDrop: FTP AV scanning error" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="11.11.11.2:5120" ctl_dst="10.0.1.49:47553" error="avg scanner is not created" file="eicar.com" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="GAV scan error" description="FTP AV scanning error"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0010" Application Control identified an application in the FTP client request or server response. The log message specifies the proxy action, application control action, action taken, application name and ID, application category and ID, and application behavior name and ID.

Format: "Allow 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.49 11.11.11.2 49843 21 msg="ProxyAllow: FTP App match" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" app_cat_name="File Transfer" app_cat_id="3" app_name="FTP Applications" app_id="1" app_beh_name="authority" app_beh_id="1" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="Application match" description="FTP App match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0011" Data Loss Prevention (DLP) detected a rule violation. The log message specifies the proxy action, the DLP sensor name, DLP rule name, the authenticated user, and the file name. The log message also specifies the source and destination IP addresses and port for the control channel of the FTP session.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 37611 msg="ProxyDrop: FTP DLP violation found" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="10.0.1.49:47553" ctl_dst="11.11.11.2:5120" dlp_sensor="test" dlp_rule="SocialsecuritynumberswithqualifyingtermsUSA" authenticated_user="testuser" file="test.docx" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="DLP violation found" description="FTP DLP violation found"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0012" Data Loss Prevention (DLP) failed to scan because of the error specified in the log message.
Description: FTP cannot perform DLP scan

Format: "Allow 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 52217 msg="ProxyAllow: FTP cannot perform DLP scan" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="11.11.11.2:5120" ctl_dst="10.0.1.49:47553" error="Error: DLP not initialized" file="ssn.docx" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="DLP cannot perform scan" description="FTP cannot perform DLP scan"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0013" Data Loss Prevention (DLP) could not scan and analyze the attachment because it is encrypted. The log message specifies the DLP sensor name, error message, the authenticated user, and the file name.

Format: "Allow 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 43974 msg="ProxyAllow: FTP DLP object unscannable" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="11.11.11.2:5120" ctl_dst="10.0.1.49:47553" dlp_sensor="test" error="unscannable object (File was encrypted)" authenticated_user="testuser" file="test.zip" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="DLP cannot scan object" description="FTP DLP object unscannable"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0014" Data Loss Prevention (DLP) could not analyze the attachment because the file was larger than the configured limit. The limit varies by platform, from one to five MB. The log message specifies the DLP sensor name and error message.
Description: FTP DLP object too large
Format: "Allow 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 43813 msg="ProxyAllow: FTP DLP object too large" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" error="DLP scan limit (5242880) exceeded" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="DLP object too large" description="FTP DLP object too large"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0015" APT Blocker identified a threat. The log message specifies the threat level, threat name, threat class, malicious activities, and file name where the threat was located.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 58661 msg="ProxyDrop: FTP APT detected" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="11.11.11.2:5120" ctl_dst="10.0.1.49:47553" md5="03e7ef270a157090e2f68079603b10fc" task_uuid="d21914d5a2bc4b618fae72da3b1c137e" threat_level="low" file="apt.txt" (FTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="APT threat detected" description="FTP APT detected"

comment: Name: File submitted to APT analysis server
Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0017" File submitted to APT analysis server for deep threat analysis. A separate log message will appear when the result is retrieved from the APT analysis server.
Description: FTP File submitted to APT analysis server

Format: "Allow 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 43490 msg="ProxyAllow: FTP File submitted to APT analysis server" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="11.11.11.2:5120" ctl_dst="10.0.1.49:47553" md5="03e7ef270a157090e2f68079603b10fc" task_uuid="d21914d5a2bc4b618fae72da3b1c137e" file="apt.txt"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="File submitted to APT analysis server" description="FTP File submitted to APT analysis server"

comment: Name: File reported safe from APT hash check
Sample: msg_id="1CFF-0018" APT hash check did not report a threat from the object
Description: FTP File reported safe from APT hash check

Format: "Allow 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 11.11.11.2 11.11.11.5 20 43490 msg="ProxyAllow: FTP File reported safe from APT hash check" proxy_act="FTP-Client.3" ctl_src="11.11.11.2:5120" ctl_dst="10.0.1.49:47553" md5="03e7ef270a157090e2f68079603b10fc" task_uuid="d21914d5a2bc4b618fae72da3b1c137e" file="apt.txt"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / FTP" name="File reported safe from APT hash check" description="FTP File reported safe from APT hash check"

Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.2 192.168.53.164 37989 21 msg="ProxyBlock: FTP Bounce Attempt" proxy_act="FTP-Client.Standard" bounce ip="10.0.1.101"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2AFF-0000" The connection was idle longer than the configured timeout value. The default value is 180 seconds.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / H.323" name="Timeout" description="H323 timeout"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2AFF-0001" This log message specifies the IP addresses for the completed H323 call.

Format: "Allow 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.2 192.168.53.167 3233 1720 msg="H323 request" proxy_act="H.323-Client.1" call_from="10.0.1.2" call_to="192.168.53.167" rcvd_bytes="171444" sent_bytes="256488" (H323-ALG-00)"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2AFF-0002" The media codec is denied because it matched a configured Denied Codec. The log message specifies the codec.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / H.323" name="Codec" description="H323 codec"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2AFF-0006" Intrusion Prevention Service (IPS) detected an intrusion threat. The log message specifies the signature ID, threat severity, signature name, signature category, destination host name, and URI path.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 3234 3230 msg="ProxyDrop: H323 IPS match" proxy_act="H.323-Client.1" signature_id="1112506" severity="4" signature_name="EXPLOIT Digium Asterisk Invalid RTP Payload Type Number Memory Corruption" signature_cat="Access Control" (H323-ALG-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / H.323" name="IPS match" description="H323 IPS match"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / H.323" name="Application match" description="H323 App match"

comment: Name: Session timeout with server idle
Sample: msg_id="1AFF-0001" The HTTP session has timed out because no traffic has been received from the server for the specified amount of time. (Default: 10 minutes)
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 6-Ext-access tcp 10.0.1.2 192.168.53.82 60654 80 msg="ProxyDeny: HTTP server response timeout" (HTTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / HTTP" name="Session timeout with server idle" description="HTTP server response timeout"

comment: Name: Session timeout with client idle
Sample: msg_id="1AFF-0002" The HTTP session has timed out because no traffic has been received from the client for the specified amount of time. (Default: 10 minutes)
Format: "Deny 1-Trusted 6-Ext-access tcp 10.0.1.2 23.3.105.139 60680 80 msg="ProxyDeny: HTTP client request timeout" (HTTP-proxy-00)"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1AFF-000A" The HTTP proxy cannot complete the URL because the host or URI value is missing. The HTTP request is denied.

comment: Sample: msg_id="1AFF-0037" The HTTP CONNECT tunnel request port matches a configured rule, or the default rule of no match. The log message specifies the matched rule name and port.

Format: "Allow 1-Trusted Firebox tcp 10.0.1.3 100.100.100.16 53531 3128 msg="ProxyReplace: HTTP connect tunnel port match" proxy_act="Explicit-Web.Standard.1" rule_name="Redirect-HTTPS" port="443" (Explicit-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / HTTP" name="Connect tunnel port match" description="HTTP connect tunnel port match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1AFF-0038" The HTTP Webproxy connection was redirected to a different proxy action because of the configuration setting in explicit proxy. The log message specifies the new proxy action used.

Format: "Allow 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.3 100.100.100.16 53532 3128 msg="ProxyReplace: HTTP webproxy redirect" proxy_act="Explicit-Web.Standard.1" redirect_action="HTTPS-Client.Standard" (Explicit-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / HTTP" name="Webproxy redirect" description="HTTP webproxy redirect"

comment: Name: File reported safe from APT hash check
Sample: msg_id="1AFF-0039" APT hash check did not report a threat from the object
Description: HTTP File reported safe from APT hash check

Format: "Allow 2-Internal-traffic 4-External-traffic tcp 192.168.2.20 192.168.3.30 34063 80 msg="ProxyAllow: HTTP File reported safe from APT hash check" proxy_act="HTTP-Client.1" host="192.168.3.30" path="/test/sample.exe" md5="dd0af53fec2267757cd90d633acd549a" task_uuid="35c8ac1aaeee4e5186d584318deb397b" (HTTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / HTTP" name="File reported safe from APT hash check" description="HTTP File reported safe from APT hash check"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1AFF-003A" The HTTP content action connection was redirected to a different proxy action because of the configuration. The log message specifies the new proxy action used as well as the current ssl status.

Format: "Allow 0-External 3-Optional-2 tcp 203.0.113.2 203.0.113.3 50560 80 msg="ProxyReplace: HTTP Content Action redirect" proxy_act="HTTP-Content.Standard.1" redirect_action="HTTP-Server.Standard.2" srv_ip="10.0.2.8" srv_port="80" ssl_offload="0" client_ssl="NONE" server_ssl="NONE" (HTTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / HTTP" name="Content redirect" description="HTTP Content redirect"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1AFF-003B" The request contained content which matched a configured content rule in the HTTP proxy. The log message specifies the content which matched the rule as well as rule details.

Format: "Allow 0-External 1-Trusted tcp 203.0.113.2 203.0.113.2 50428 80 msg="ProxyReplace: HTTP Request content match" proxy_act="HTTP-Content.Standard.1" rule_name="forums" content_type="URN" dstname="203.0.113.2" arg="/forums/index.html" srv_ip="10.0.2.8" srv_port="80" ssl_offload="1" redirect_action="HTTP-Server.Standard.1" (HTTP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / HTTP" name="Request Content match" description="HTTP Request content match"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1BFF-0027" The file requested for Data Loss Prevention (DLP) analysis is larger than the configured limit. The default value varies by platform, from one to five MB. The log specifies the DLP sensor name and error message.
Description: SMTP DLP object too large

Format: "May 30 06:36:45 2014 gary_xtmv local1.info smtp-proxy[2861]: msg_id="1BFF-0027" Allow 1-Trusted 0-External tcp 10.0.1.2 100.100.100.3 50976 25 msg="ProxyAllow: SMTP DLP oject too large" proxy_act="SMTP-Outgoing.1" sender="ghong@watchguard.com" recipients="wg@localhost" error="DLP scan limit (524288) exceeded" filename="2M-dlp-violates-end.txt" (SMTP-proxy-00)"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2DFF-0001" Intrusion Prevention Service (IPS) detected an intrusion threat in TCP-UDP proxy traffic. The log message specifies the action taken, signature ID, threat severity, signature name, and signature category.

Format: "Deny 0-External 1-Trusted udp 10.0.1.5 192.168.53.143 1025 80 msg="ProxyDrop: TCP-UDP IPS match" proxy_act="TCP-UDP-Proxy.1" signature_id="1110070" severity="4" signature_name="DOS Apache mod_ssl HTTPS Request DOS -1" signature_cat="Dos/DDoS" (TCP-UDP-proxy-00)"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Proxy / TCP-UDP" name="IPS match" description="IP IPS match"
